uart-hwfc.help: Enable hardware flow control for STDIO.

uart-timeout-us.help: Idle time in micro seconds between characters before buffer is flushed.

uart-0-fifo-size.help: UART0 FIFO buffer. FIFO buffer is filled from DMA buffer.

uart-1-fifo-size.help: UART1 FIFO buffer. FIFO buffer is filled from DMA buffer.

uart-dma-size.help: UART DMA buffer. 2 buffers per instance. DMA buffer is filled by UARTE
